verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, saying <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH935>, When ye come into the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> you <WH776>, then shall the land keep <WH7673> a sabbath <WH7676> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

That which groweth of itself <WH5599> of thy harvest <WH7105> thou shalt not reap <WH7114>, and the grapes <WH6025> of thy undressed <WH5139> vine thou shalt not gather <WH1219>: it shall be a year <WH8141> of solemn rest <WH7677> for the land <WH776>.

And for thy cattle <WH929>, and for the beasts <WH2416> that are in thy land <WH776>, shall all the increase <WH8393> thereof be for food <WH398>.

And thou shalt number <WH5608> seven <WH7651> sabbaths <WH7676> of years <WH8141> unto thee <WH7651>, seven times <WH6471> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>; and there shall be unto thee the days <WH3117> of seven <WH7651> sabbaths <WH7676> of years <WH8141>, even forty <WH705> and nine <WH8672> years <WH8141>.

Then shalt thou send abroad <WH5674> the loud <WH8643> trumpet <WH7782> on the tenth <WH6218> day of the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>; in the day <WH3117> of atonement <WH3725> shall ye send abroad <WH5674> the trumpet <WH7782> throughout all your land <WH776>.

And ye shall hallow <WH6942> the fiftieth <WH2572> year <WH8141>, and proclaim <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> throughout the land <WH776> unto all the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof <WH3104>: it shall be a jubilee unto you <WH7725>; and ye shall return every man <WH376> unto his possession <WH272>, and ye shall return <WH7725> every man <WH376> unto his family <WH4940>.

A jubilee <WH3104> shall that fiftieth <WH2572> year <WH8141> be unto you <WH2232>: ye shall not sow, neither reap <WH7114> that which groweth <WH5599> of itself in it <WH1219>, nor gather the grapes in it of the undressed vines <WH5139>.
For it is a jubilee <WH3104>; it shall be holy <WH6944> unto you <WH398>: ye shall eat the increase <WH8393> thereof out of the field <WH7704>.
In this year <WH8141> of jubilee <WH3104> ye shall return <WH7725> every man <WH376> unto his possession <WH272>.
And if thou sell <WH4376> aught <WH4465> unto thy neighbor <WH5997>, or buy <WH7069> of thy neighbor <WH5997>'s hand <WH3027>, ye shall not wrong <WH3238> one <WH376> another <WH251>.

According to the number <WH4557> of years <WH8141> after <WH310> the jubilee <WH3104> thou shalt buy <WH7069> of thy neighbor <WH5997>, and according unto the number <WH4557> of years <WH8141> of the crops <WH8393> he shall sell unto thee <WH4376>.

According <WH6310> to the multitude <WH7230> of the years <WH8141> thou shalt increase <WH7235> the price <WH4736> thereof <WH6310>, and according to the fewness <WH4591> of the years <WH8141> thou shalt diminish <WH4591> the price <WH4736> of it <WH4557>; for the number of the crops <WH8393> doth he sell unto thee <WH4376>.
And ye shall not wrong <WH3238> one <WH376> another <WH5997>; but thou shalt fear <WH3372> thy God <WH430>: for I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.
Wherefore ye shall do <WH6213> my statutes <WH2708>, and keep <WH8104> mine ordinances <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them <WH3427>; and ye shall dwell in the land <WH776> in safety <WH983>.
And the land <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> its fruit <WH6529>, and ye shall eat <WH398> your fill <WH7648>, and dwell <WH3427> therein in safety <WH983>.
And if ye shall say <WH559>, What shall we eat <WH398> the seventh <WH7637> year <WH8141>? Behold <WH2232>, we shall not sow, nor gather <WH622> in our increase <WH8393>;
then I will command <WH6680> my blessing <WH1293> upon you in the sixth <WH8345> year <WH8141>, and it shall bring forth <WH6213> fruit <WH8393> for the three <WH7969> years <WH8141>.

And ye shall sow <WH2232> the eighth <WH8066> year <WH8141>, and eat <WH398> of the fruits <WH8393>, the old <WH3465> store <WH8671>; until the ninth year <WH8141>, until its fruits <WH8393> come in <WH935>, ye shall eat <WH398> the old store <WH3465>.
And the land <WH776> shall not be sold <WH4376> in perpetuity <WH6783>; for the land <WH776> is mine <WH1616>: for ye are strangers and sojourners with me <WH1616>.
And in all the land <WH776> of your possession <WH272> ye shall grant <WH5414> a redemption <WH1353> for the land <WH776>.

If thy brother <WH251> be waxed poor <WH4134>, and sell <WH4376> some of his possession <WH272>, then shall his kinsman <WH7138> that is next unto him come <WH935>, and shall redeem <WH1350> that which his brother <WH251> hath sold <WH4465>.
And if a man <WH376> have no one to redeem <WH1350> it <WH3027>, and he be waxed rich <WH1767> and find sufficient to redeem it <WH4672>;

But if he <WH3027> be not able <WH1767> to get <WH4672> it back for himself <WH4465>, then that which he hath sold shall remain in the hand <WH3027> of him that hath bought <WH7069> it until the year <WH8141> of jubilee <WH3104>: and in the jubilee <WH3104> it shall go out <WH3318>, and he shall return <WH7725> unto his possession <WH272>.

And if a man <WH376> sell <WH4376> a dwelling <WH4186> - house <WH1004> in a walled <WH2346> city <WH5892>, then he may redeem <WH1353> it within a whole <WH8552> year <WH8141> after it is sold <WH4465>; for a full year <WH3117> shall he have the right of redemption <WH1353>.

And if it be not redeemed <WH1350> within the space <WH4390> of a full <WH8549> year <WH8141>, then the house <WH1004> that is in the walled <WH2346> city <WH5892> shall be made <WH6965> sure in perpetuity <WH6783> to him that bought <WH7069> it <WH1755>, throughout his generations: it shall not go out <WH3318> in the jubilee <WH3104>.

Nevertheless the cities <WH5892> of the Levites <WH3881>, the houses <WH1004> of the cities <WH5892> of their possession <WH272>, may the Levites <WH3881> redeem <WH1353> at any time <WH5769>.

But the field <WH7704> of the suburbs <WH4054> of their cities <WH5892> may not be sold <WH4376>; for it is their perpetual <WH5769> possession <WH272>.

And if thy brother <WH251> be waxed poor <WH4134>, and his hand fail <WH4131> with thee <WH3027>; then thou shalt uphold <WH2388> him <WH1616>: as a stranger and a sojourner <WH1616> shall he live with thee <WH2416>.
Take <WH3947> thou no interest <WH5392> of him or increase <WH8636>, but fear <WH3372> thy God <WH430>; that thy brother <WH251> may live with thee <WH2416>.
Thou shalt not give <WH5414> him thy money <WH3701> upon interest <WH5392>, nor give <WH5414> him thy victuals <WH400> for increase <WH4768>.
I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, who brought you forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to give <WH5414> you the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, and to be your God <WH430>.
And if thy brother <WH251> be waxed poor <WH4134> with thee <WH4376>, and sell himself unto thee <WH5647>; thou shalt not make him to serve <WH5656> as a bond-servant <WH5650>.
As a hired servant <WH7916>, and as a sojourner <WH8453>, he shall be with thee <WH5647>; he shall serve with thee unto the year <WH8141> of jubilee <WH3104>:

then shall he go out <WH3318> from thee <WH1121>, he and his children with him <WH7725>, and shall return unto his own family <WH4940>, and unto the possession <WH272> of his fathers <WH1> shall he return <WH7725>.
For they are my servants <WH5650>, whom I brought forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: they shall not be sold <WH4376> as <WH4466> bondmen <WH5650>.
Thou shalt not rule <WH7287> over him with rigor <WH6531>, but shalt fear <WH3372> thy God <WH430>.

And as for thy bondmen <WH5650>, and thy bondmaids <WH519>, whom thou shalt have <WH1471>; of the nations that are round about <WH5439> you <WH7069>, of them shall ye buy bondmen <WH5650> and bondmaids <WH519>.

And if a stranger <WH8453> or sojourner <WH1616> with thee <WH3027> be waxed rich <WH5381>, and thy brother <WH251> be waxed poor <WH4134> beside him <WH4376>, and sell himself unto the stranger <WH1616> or sojourner <WH8453> with thee <WH6133>, or to the stock of the stranger <WH1616>'s family <WH4940>;
